name: cdk
description: AWS CDK infrastructure with CI/CD pipeline for Aurora MySQL, PostgreSQL, and EC2 instances

scripts.install:all: cd mysql && npm install && cd ../postgres && npm install && cd ../ec2-instances && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd mysql && npm run build && cd ../postgres && npm run build && cd ../ec2-instances && npm run build
scripts.synth:all: cd mysql && npm run synth && cd ../postgres && npm run synth && cd ../ec2-instances && npm run synth
scripts.deploy:all: cd mysql && npm run deploy && cd ../postgres && npm run deploy && cd ../ec2-instances && npm run deploy
scripts.destroy:all: cd ec2-instances && npm run destroy && cd ../postgres && npm run destroy && cd ../mysql && npm run destroy
scripts.clean: cd mysql && rm -rf node_modules cdk.out && cd ../postgres && rm -rf node_modules cdk.out && cd ../ec2-instances && rm -rf node_modules cdk.out
